job_history.work_description: Oversee multiple departments responsible for Global FP&A, Productivity Tracking, R&D Analysis, Warranty, Pricing and Consumer Division Financial Reporting. Lead Canadian Finance Group responsible for P&L, Balance Sheet, Reporting, Pricing and F/X. Implemented improved cost-out reporting highlighting areas of concern and achieved global stretch targets in 2014.

Oversaw month-end and period-end closing, management reporting, forecast and budgeting analysis and reporting. Managed a team of up to 3 individuals responsible for tracking and analyzing cost center spending in the areas of purchasing/procurement, warehouse, logistics, marketing and administrative expense.

Oversaw Month-end Close for 5 Sales Channels with Trade Revenues of $550M Annually and Intercompany Revenue of $225M Annually. Implemented 2 day Financial Close (down from 3 day) by working with IT to automate Journal Entries / Reports and creating an Access Database to assist in speed of financial analysis and standard Journal Entries.
Coordinated Material Productivity reporting with Finance and Sourcing departments in 23 plants and distribution centers globally and conducted monthly Commodity Reviews with sector management.
Learned audit processes and control procedures through working on Internal Control Reviews, Oracle Implementation Reviews and Physical Inventory Exemptions.
Worked with Financial Analyst and management on 2007 Annual Operating Plan for Enterprise Services, as well as helped create the allocation model for the 2007 bill-outs to the Sectors.
Learned Inventory control procedures including tag control, observation and reconciliation during the Annual Physical Inventory and led inventory counts at 2 off-site warehouses.
Developed leadership skills as a sales manager and agent for a fortune 500 Insurance Company.

skills.name: Financial Planning and Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial planning and analysis, including overseeing month-end and period-end closing, management reporting, forecast and budgeting analysis and reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held multiple leadership roles, including Director of Finance and Financial Planning and Analysis Manager, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Cost Accounting
skills.explanation: Has experience in cost accounting, including inventory control procedures and leading inventory counts, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial reporting, including overseeing multiple departments responsible for global financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has experience in budgeting, including creating allocation models and working on annual operating plans, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial analysis, including analyzing cost center spending and creating financial models, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in project management, including overseeing multiple projects and teams, showing strong proficiency.
